resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105835</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105835</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206834</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grant-Kohrs Ranch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grant-Kohrs-Kohrs Ranch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ranch de Grant-Kohrs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rancho De Grant-Kohrs-Kohrs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ranch Del Grant-Kohrs-Kohrs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχορήγηση- Kohrs αγρόκτημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rancho De Grant-Kohrs-Kohrs</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">commemorates America's frontier cattle era. The ranch?located north of Yellowstone in Deer Lodge, Montana?is among the best surviving examples of an economic strategy based on the western cattle industry of the 1850s-1970s. A German immigrant, Conrad Kohrs, purchased the ranch in 1866 and began by supplying to mining camp butcher shops.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gedenkt viehära Amerikas Grenz. 
Ranch?located Norden von Yellowstone in der Rotwild-Hütte, 
Montana?is unter den besten Überlebenbeispielen einer ökonomischen 
Strategie, die auf der westlichen Viehindustrie des 1850s-1970s 
basierte. Ein deutscher Immigrant, Konrad Kohrs, kaufte die 
Ranch 1866 und fing an, indem er an gewinnenlagermetzgerei lieferte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commémore l'ère de bétail de la frontière de 
l'Amérique. Ranch?located le nord de Yellowstone dans la loge 
de cerfs communs, Montana?is parmi les meilleurs exemples de survie 
d'une stratégie économique basée sur l'industrie occidentale de 
bétail du 1850s-1970s. Un immigré allemand, Conrad Kohrs, a 
acheté le ranch en 1866 et a commencé par l'approvisionnement aux 
boucheries d'extraction de camp.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comemora a era do gado da fronteira de América. 
Ranch?located o norte de Yellowstone no alojamento dos cervos, 
Montana?is entre os mais melhores exemplos sobreviver de uma 
estratégia econômica baseada na indústria ocidental do gado do 
1850s-1970s. Um immigrant alemão, Conrad Kohrs, comprou o 
rancho em 1866 e começou fornecendo às lojas de carniceiro minando 
do acampamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">commemora l'era dei bestiami di frontiera 
dell'America. Ranch?located il nord di Yellowstone nella casetta
dei cervi, Montana?is fra gli esempi di sopravvivenza migliori di una 
strategia economica basata sull'industria occidentale dei bestiami del
1850s-1970s. Un immigrante tedesco, Conrad Kohrs, ha comprato il
ranch in 1866 ed ha cominciato fornendo a di macelleria estraenti 
dell'accampamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τιμά την μνήμη της εποχής συνοριακών βοοειδών της 
Αμερικής. Βόρεια Yellowstone στα ελάφια κατοικεί, 
Montana?is μεταξύ των καλύτερων επιζόντων παραδειγμάτων μιας 
οικονομικής στρατηγικής βασισμένης στη δυτική βιομηχανία 
βοοειδών της 1850ς-δεκαετίας του '70. Ένας γερμανικός 
μετανάστης, conrad Kohrs, αγόρασε το αγρόκτημα το 1866 και
άρχισε με την παροχή στα καταστήματα χασάπηδων στρατόπεδων 
μεταλλείας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conmemora la era de los ganados de la frontera de 
América. Ranch?located el norte de Yellowstone en casa de campo
de los ciervos, Montana?is entre los mejores ejemplos el sobrevivir de
una estrategia económica basada en la industria occidental de los 
ganados del 1850s-1970s. Un inmigrante alemán, Conrado Kohrs, 
compró el rancho en 1866 y comenzó proveiendo a las carnicerías del
campo que minaban.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206834</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105835</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/grant-kohrs-ranch</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
